评论概述: Needs Improvement Before Selling as Finished Design
评论详情: I like where it comes up to on my waist, but the area for the butt in these is about as big as the area for the rest of the leg so if you have a curve to your rear it will hug it and not in a boho way. The breast pads feel like they are made almost out of packing peanuts, and the general quality of the fabric makes the cloth under the top ride up. Not to mention since the cloth is the same material as a cheap napkin it doesn't hold any definition around your breast. It is also slightly see-through. This is a good concept, and if they fixed these issues, included the shipping in the cost, and offered free returns, I would be willing to pay more for this outfit. Also, a small recommendation if they redesign this: the pattern on the top (circles, lines, squares, etc.) is so much bigger than the same pattern on the pants, it might actually work better to make them match and incorporate the butterflies on the top more.
